login_subtitle: Login into NXT Web Wallet now
logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?
register_subtitle: Register to NXT Web Wallet now.
could_not_decrypt: We could not log you in with this information.
could_not_find_secretphrase: Your username and / or email doesn't exist, we could not find the secretphrase.
username_email_exists: This username or email already exists and cannot be used.
successfully_registered: Successfully registered your account. You can now login.
passwords_should_equal: Passwords should be the same in both fields
click_to_copy_account: Click to copy your account number
account_help_message: Communicate your account number to your interlocutor so they can send you NXT. It is perfectly safe to make your account number public.
no_transactions: No transactions yet. Make your first today!
confirm_send_money_amount: Please confirm that you want to send {amount} NXT
qr_help_message: This QR code contains your account number. Use a QR scanning mobile app in order to access it.
invalid_address: This account number is not valid
is_not_admin: This user is not an admin
search_help: Search for username, email or account number
download_backup_help: By choosing 'Download Wallet', you will download an encrypted backup of your wallet to your current device. You can restore your backup file on our login page by choosing the 'Restore Wallet' option and providing your login and password. Backups are not synchronised between devices.
download_backup_safari_help: When using the Safari browser, after clicking the download button you need to save the page (press CMD + S) as type "Page Source" and name it "wallet.json".
connection_error: Could not connect. Please try again later
forging_explanation: Forging is used to validate transactions. Each time you forge you create a new block which allows you to collect all transaction fees in this block. If there are no transactions in a block you will get no fees. The more NXT you have, the higher chance of forging a block. To forge you must have had a minimum of 2,000 NXT in your account for at least 1 day.
forging_help: Submitting this form will send your private key to the specified node.
